tool_description: Generate German language recipes and recipe images using AI. Extract or search recipes from the web.
name: gustar.io Deutsche Rezepte
title: gustar.io Deutsche Rezepte

api_list.name: Web Recipe Search
api_list.description: Performs a full-text search on our recipe database of German language recipes on the Web.

optional_parameters.name: diet
optional_parameters.description: Which diet to filter for. Valid options are: 'vegan', 'vegetarian'.

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: Difficulty to limit search on. One of ['easy', 'medium', 'hard']. Will filter by presence of difficulty label.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number. The first page is page 0.

optional_parameters.name: timeLimit
optional_parameters.description: Length of totalTime in seconds. E.g. 3600 for recipes that take a maximum of 60 minutes.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: If the results should be sorted by user rating.

api_list.name: Recipe Web Crawler
api_list.description: Crawl any URL for structured recipes. The process is optimized for German recipe websites.
